title: Herb Turley, D.C.
description: Herb Turley, D.C. practices as a Chiropractor in San Antonio, TX.
cleaned_text: San Antonio, TX 78201. Chiropractors diagnose and treat common spinal misalignments that can occur from lifestyle or injuries causing pain, discomfort and degenerative conditions. Herb Turley, D.C. may be able to treat; back pain, sciatica, neck pain, shoulder pain, headaches, sports injuries, and auto accident injuries. To learn more, or to make an appointment with Herb Turley, D.C. in San Antonio, TX, please call (210) 734-5815 for more information.
